participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often finds solace in her pets.
participant_1.background: My pets are a constant source of comfort and love. I am bipolar. I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it. I've had my cards read a couple of times. I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Playful and caring, with a light-hearted approach to life.
participant_2.background: I'm a bit of a klutz, but I always try to be careful around my pets. I love dogs and cats. I would not be able to teach if I were blind because I would not be able to see my students or the blackboard. I love to lamp. I sing in the shower.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I just got back from a walk with my dog.
That sounds nice! I love to take my dog for walks too. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's a great dog.
Golden retrievers are the best! They're so sweet and loving.
They are! He's my best friend.
Do you have any other pets?
No, just Buddy.
I have a cat and a fish.
I love cats! What kind of cat do you have?
I have a tabby cat named Mittens. She's a little bit of a troublemaker, but I love her.
Tabby cats are so cute! I love their stripes.
Me too! They're my favorite kind of cat.
I've had my cards read a couple of times. What do you think of psychics?
I think they're interesting, but I don't really believe in them.
I'm not sure what to think of them. I've never had a reading that was really accurate, but I've also never had one that was really wrong either.
I think it's just a matter of believing in them. If you believe that they can tell the future, then they can. If you don't believe in them, then they can't.
I guess that's true. I'm not sure if I believe in them or not, but I'm always curious to hear what they have to say.
Me too! I've never had a reading that was really boring.
Me neither! I always find them to be at least a little bit interesting.
I'm glad you're not a believer! I would hate to have to compete with the psychics for your attention.
Ha ha! I'm sure you could give them a run for their money!
I'm not sure about that! I'm not very good at reading minds.
I'm sure you're better at it than you think!
Maybe! I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! I would love to hear what you think of it.
